nodes.text: The situation was tailor-made for an individual voluntary arrangement ( IVA ).
Bankruptcy would destroy the business and yield relatively little for the creditors.
An IVA on the other hand would preserve the business and enable the creditors to receive payments from the income of the nursing home.

If Bankruptcy would destroy the business and yield relatively little for the creditors while an AVI would preserve the business and enable the creditors to receive payments from the income the situation is tailor-made for an IVA.
